declarations.name: dnn-autocomplete.tsx
declarations.description: Building a component that is flexible enough for multiple use cases is not easy. This component externalizes some of its behavior to make it more reusable. To use it effectivelly please read the usage examples carefuly.

attributes.name: autocomplete
attributes.description:
Defines the type of automatic completion the browser could use.
See https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/HTML/Attributes/autocomplete

attributes.name: disabled
attributes.description: Defines whether the field is disabled.

attributes.name: help-text
attributes.description: Defines the help label displayed under the field.

attributes.name: label
attributes.description: The label for this autocomplete.

attributes.name: name
attributes.description: The name for this autocomplete when used in forms.

attributes.name: preload-threshold-pixels
attributes.description:
How many suggestions to preload in pixels of their height.
This is used to calculate the virtual scroll height and request
more items before they get into view.

attributes.name: required
attributes.description: Defines whether the field requires having a value.

attributes.name: total-suggestions
attributes.description:
The total amount of suggestions for the given search query.
This can be used to show virtual scroll and pagination progressive feeding.
The needMoreItems event should be used to request more items.

attributes.name: value
attributes.description: Defines the value for this autocomplete

members.name: renderSuggestion
members.description: Callback to render suggestions, if not provided, only the label will be rendered.

members.name: suggestions
members.description: Sets the list of suggestions.

members.name: checkValidity
members.description: Reports the input validity details. See https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/API/ValidityState

members.name: setCustomValidity
members.description: Can be used to set a custom validity message.

events.name: itemSelected
events.description: Fires when an item is selected.

events.name: needMoreItems
events.description: Fires when the component needs to display more items in the suggestions.

events.name: searchQueryChanged
events.description:
Fires when the search query has changed.
This is almost like valueInput, but it is debounced
and can be used to trigger a search query without overloading
API endpoints while typing.

events.name: valueChange
events.description: Fires when the value has changed and the user exits the input.

events.name: valueInput
events.description: Fires when the using is inputing data (on keystrokes).

cssProperties.name: --background-color
cssProperties.description: Defines the background color.

cssProperties.name: --control-radius
cssProperties.description: Defines the radius for the control corners.

cssProperties.name: --danger-color
cssProperties.description: Defines the danger color used for invalid data.

cssProperties.name: --focus-color
cssProperties.description: Defines the color when the component is focused.

cssProperties.name: --foreground-color
cssProperties.description: Defines the foreground color.

attributes.name: appearance
attributes.description: Defines the look of the button.

attributes.name: confirm
attributes.description: Optionally add a confirmation dialog before firing the action.

attributes.name: confirm-message
attributes.description: The text of the confirmation message;

attributes.name: confirm-no-text
attributes.description: The text of the no button for confirmation.

attributes.name: confirm-yes-text
attributes.description: The text of the yes button for confirmation.

attributes.name: disabled
attributes.description: Disables the button

attributes.name: form-button-type
attributes.description:
Optional button type,
can be either submit, reset or button and defaults to button if not specified.
Warning: DNN wraps the whole page in a form, only use this if you are handling
form submission manually.
Warning: This will be deprecated in the next version and replaced with a new 'type' property.

attributes.name: reversed
attributes.description: Optionally reverses the button style.

attributes.name: size
attributes.description: Optionally sets the button size, small normal or large, defaults to normal

attributes.name: type
attributes.description: Optional button style,

events.name: canceled
events.description: Fires when confirm is true and the user cancels the action.

events.name: confirmed
events.description: Fires when confirm is true and the user confirms the action.

cssProperties.name: --background-color
cssProperties.description: The background color of the button.

cssProperties.name: --border-color
cssProperties.description: The border color of the button.

cssProperties.name: --border-radius
cssProperties.description: The border radius of the button.

cssProperties.name: --border-size
cssProperties.description: The border size of the button.

cssProperties.name: --color
cssProperties.description: The text color of the button.

cssProperties.name: --padding
cssProperties.description: The padding of the button.

attributes.name: checked
attributes.description: Defines if the checkbox is checked (true) or unchecked (false) or in an intermediate state (undefined)

attributes.name: name
attributes.description: The name to show in the formData (if using forms).

attributes.name: use-intermediate
attributes.description: Defines if clicking the checkbox will go through the intermediate state between checked and unchecked (tri-state)

attributes.name: value
attributes.description: The value for this checkbox (not to be confused with its checked state).

members.name: nextStateHandler
members.description:
A function that will be called when the checkbox needs to change state and returns the next state.
Can be used to customize the order of the states when the component is clicked.
Only called if you also use the tri-state feature (useIntermediate).

events.name: checkedchange
events.description: Fires up when the checkbox checked property changes.

slots.name: checkedicon
slots.description: Allows overriding the default checked icon.

slots.name: intermediateicon
slots.description: If intermadiate state is used, allows overriding its icon.

cssProperties.name: --focus-color
cssProperties.description: The color to outline the checkbox when hovered or focused, default to the dnn primary color.

attributes.name: collapse-text
attributes.description: Collapse text for screen readers

attributes.name: expand-text
attributes.description: Expand text for screen readers

attributes.name: expanded
attributes.description: Is the chevron expanded

events.name: changed
events.description: Fires up when the expanded status changes

attributes.name: expanded
attributes.description: Defines if the panel is expanded or not.

attributes.name: transition-duration
attributes.description: Defines the transition time in ms, defaults to 150ms

members.name: updateSize
members.description: Updates the component height, use to update after a slot content changes.

events.name: dnnCollapsibleHeightChanged
events.description: Fires whenever the collapsible height has changed

declarations.name: dnn-color-input.tsx
declarations.description: A custom input component that allows previewing and changing a color value.

attributes.name: color
attributes.description: Sets the initial color, must be a valid 8 character hexadecimal string without the # sign.

attributes.name: contrast-color
attributes.description: Sets the initial contrast color, must be a valid 8 character hexadecimal string without the # sign.

attributes.name: dark-color
attributes.description: Sets the initial dark color, must be a valid 8 character hexadecimal string without the # sign.

attributes.name: help-text
attributes.description: Defines the help label displayed under the field.

attributes.name: label
attributes.description: The label for this input.

attributes.name: light-color
attributes.description: Sets the initial light color, must be a valid 8 character hexadecimal string without the # sign.

attributes.name: name
attributes.description: The name for this input if forms are used.

attributes.name: readonly
attributes.description: Disables interacting with the component.

attributes.name: use-contrast-color
attributes.description: If true, the picker will allow selecting a contast color too.

attributes.name: use-dark-color
attributes.description: If true, the picker will allow selecting a dark color too.

attributes.name: use-light-color
attributes.description: If true, the picker will allow selecting a light color too.

members.name: localization

type.text: { contrast: string; preview: string; cancel: string; confirm: string; normal: string; light: string; dark: string; }

members.description: Can be used to customize the text language.
members.default:
{
    contrast: "Contrast",
    preview: "Preview",
    cancel: "Cancel",
    confirm: "Confirm",
    normal: "Normal",
    light: "Light",
    dark: "Dark",
  }

events.name: colorChange
events.description: Fires when the color was changed and confirmed.

events.name: colorInput
events.description: Fires live as the user is trying color changes inside the modal.

slots.name: prefix
slots.description: Can be used to inject content before the input field.

slots.name: suffix
slots.description: Can be used to inject content after the input field.

cssProperties.name: --background-color
cssProperties.description: Defines the background color.

cssProperties.name: --contast-text-align
cssProperties.description: Allows customizing the text alignment of the contast indicator text.

cssProperties.name: --control-radius
cssProperties.description: Defines the radius for the control corners.

cssProperties.name: --focus-color
cssProperties.description: Defines the color when the component is focused.

cssProperties.name: --foreground-color
cssProperties.description: Defines the foreground color.

attributes.name: color
attributes.description: Sets the initial color, must be a valid 8 character hexadecimal string without the # sign.

attributes.name: color-box-height
attributes.description: Sets the width-height ratio of the color picker saturation-lightness box.

events.name: colorChanged
events.description: Fires up when the color is changed and emits a ColorInfo object

attributes.name: allow-camera-mode
attributes.description:
If true, will allow the user to take a snapshot
using the device camera. (only works over https).

attributes.name: capture-quality
attributes.description:
Specifies the jpeg quality for when the device
camera is used to generate a picture.
Needs to be a number between 0 and 1 and defaults to 0.8

attributes.name: max-file-size
attributes.description: Max file size in bytes.

attributes.name: name
attributes.description: The name of the field when used in a form.

members.name: allowedExtensions
members.description:
A list of allowed file extensions.
If not specified, any file is allowed.
Ex: ["jpg", "jpeg", "gif", "png"]

members.name: resx
members.description: Localization strings

events.name: filesSelected
events.description: Fires when file were selected.

cssProperties.name: --border-color
cssProperties.description: The color of the border.

cssProperties.name: --border-radius
cssProperties.description: The radius of the controls borders.

cssProperties.name: --drop-background-color
cssProperties.description: The color of the background when a file is dropping.

declarations.name: dnn-example-form.tsx
declarations.description: Do not use this component in production, it is meant for testing purposes only and is not distributed in the production package.

declarations.name: dnn-fieldset.tsx
declarations.description: A custom input component that wraps the html input element is a mobile friendly component that supports a label, some help text and other features.

attributes.name: disabled
attributes.description: If true, the fieldset will display as disabled.

attributes.name: float-label
attributes.description: If true, the label will float in the container, set false to show it on top.

attributes.name: focused
attributes.description: If true the fieldset will display as focused.

attributes.name: help-text
attributes.description: Can be used to show some help text about this field.

attributes.name: invalid
attributes.description: If true, the  fieldset will display as invalid.

attributes.name: label
attributes.description: Sets the text of the fieldset label (caption).

attributes.name: resizable
attributes.description: Can be set to specify if the fieldset can be resized by the user.

members.name: disable
members.description: Sets the fieldset to a disabled state.

members.name: enable
members.description: Sets the fieldset to an enabled state.

members.name: pinLabel
members.description: Places the label on the top of the container.

members.name: setBlurred
members.description: Unsets the fieldset focused state.

members.name: setFocused
members.description: Sets the fieldset to the focused state.

members.name: setValidity
members.description: Sets the validity of the field.

members.name: unpinLabel
members.description: Places the label in the vertical middle of the container.

slots.name: label-prefix
slots.description: Can be used to inject content before the labe.

slots.name: label-suffix
slots.description: Can be used to inject content after the label.

cssProperties.name: --control-radius
cssProperties.description: Defines the radius for the control corners.

cssProperties.name: --danger-color
cssProperties.description: Defines the danger color used for invalid data.

cssProperties.name: --fieldset-background-color
cssProperties.description: Defines the background color.

cssProperties.name: --fieldset-foreground-color
cssProperties.description: Defines the foreground color.

cssProperties.name: --focus-color
cssProperties.description: Defines the color when the component is focused.

declarations.name: dnn-image-cropper.tsx
declarations.description:
Allows cropping an image in-browser with the option to enforce a specific final size.
All computation happens in the browser and the final image is emmited
in an event that has a data-url of the image.

attributes.name: height
attributes.description: Sets the desired final image height.

attributes.name: name
attributes.description: The name of the control when used in a form.

attributes.name: prevent-undersized
attributes.description: When set to true, prevents cropping an image smaller than the required size, which would blow pixel and make the final picture look blurry.

attributes.name: quality
attributes.description: Sets the output quality of the cropped image (number between 0 and 1).

attributes.name: width
attributes.description: Sets the desired final image width.

members.name: resx
members.description:
Can be used to customize controls text.
Some values support tokens, see default values for examples.

members.name: clear
members.description: Clears the current image and crop (resets the component).

events.name: imageCropChanged
events.description: When the image crop changes, emits the dataurl for the new cropped image.

events.name: imageFileCropChanged
events.description:
Emits both when a file is initially select and when the crop has changed.
Compared to imageCropChanged, this event emits the file itself, which can be useful for uploading the file to a server including its name.

declarations.name: dnn-input.tsx
declarations.description: A custom input component that wraps the html input element is a mobile friendly component that supports a label, some help text and other features.

attributes.name: allow-show-password
attributes.description: If true, enables users to switch between a password and a text field (to view their password).

attributes.name: autocomplete
attributes.description: Defines the type of auto-completion to use for this field, see https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/HTML/Attributes/autocomplete.

attributes.name: disabled
attributes.description: Defines whether the field is disabled.

attributes.name: help-text
attributes.description: Defines the help label displayed under the field.

attributes.name: inputmode
attributes.description:
Hints at the type of data that might be entered by the user while editing the element or its contents.
This allows a browser to display an appropriate virtual keyboard.

attributes.name: label
attributes.description: The label for this input.

attributes.name: max
attributes.description: Defines the maximum allowed value.

attributes.name: maxlength
attributes.description: Defines the maximum amount of charaters.

attributes.name: min
attributes.description: Defines the minimum allowed value.

attributes.name: minlength
attributes.description: Defines the minimum amount of charaters.

attributes.name: multiple
attributes.description: If true, allows multiple emails to be entered separated by commas.

attributes.name: name
attributes.description: The name for this input when used in forms.

attributes.name: pattern
attributes.description: Valid for text, search, url, tel, email, and password, the pattern attribute defines a regular expression that the input's value must match in order for the value to pass constraint validation.

attributes.name: readonly
attributes.description: Defines wheter the defined value is readonly.

attributes.name: required
attributes.description: Defines whether the field requires having a value.

attributes.name: step
attributes.description: Defines the possible steps for numbers and dates/times. See https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/HTML/Element/input/date#step

attributes.name: type
attributes.description: The input type, supports most of html standard input type, see https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/HTML/Element/input#input_types.

attributes.name: value
attributes.description: The value of the input.

members.name: checkValidity
members.description: Reports the input validity details. See https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/API/ValidityState

members.name: setCustomValidity
members.description: Can be used to set a custom validity message.

events.name: valueChange
events.description: Fires when the value has changed and the user exits the input.

events.name: valueInput
events.description: Fires when the using is inputing data (on keystrokes).

slots.name: prefix
slots.description: Can be used to inject content before the input field.

slots.name: suffix
slots.description: Can be used to inject content after the input field.

cssProperties.name: --background-color
cssProperties.description: Defines the background color.

cssProperties.name: --control-radius
cssProperties.description: Defines the radius for the control corners.

cssProperties.name: --danger-color
cssProperties.description: Defines the danger color used for invalid data.

cssProperties.name: --focus-color
cssProperties.description: Defines the color when the component is focused.

cssProperties.name: --foreground-color
cssProperties.description: Defines the foreground color.

cssProperties.name: --input-text-align
cssProperties.description: Allows customizing the text alignment of the input text.

attributes.name: backdrop-dismiss
attributes.description: Pass false to remove the backdrop click auto-dismiss feature.

attributes.name: close-text
attributes.description:
Optionally pass the aria-label text for the close button.
Defaults to "Close modal" if not provided.

attributes.name: resizable
attributes.description: If set to true, the modal becomes resizable.

attributes.name: show-close-button
attributes.description:
Optionally you can pass false to not show the close button.
If you decide to do so, you should either not also prevent dismissal by clicking the backdrop
or provide your own dismissal logic in the modal content.

attributes.name: visible
attributes.description: Reflects the visible state of the modal.

members.name: hide
members.description: Hides the modal

members.name: show
members.description: Shows the modal

events.name: dismissed
events.description: Fires when the modal is dismissed.

cssProperties.name: --max-width
cssProperties.description: The maximum width of the module.

attributes.name: language
attributes.description: Defines the language for the editor.

attributes.name: name
attributes.description: The name of the control to use for forms.

attributes.name: value
attributes.description: Sets the code contained in the editor

events.name: contentChanged
events.description: Emits the new value of the content when it is changed.

cssProperties.name: --monaco-editor-height
cssProperties.description: height of the editor, default is 50vh

cssProperties.name: --monaco-editor-width
cssProperties.description: width of the editor, default is 100%

members.name: foundUsers
members.description: The list of users to show under the search users field when a search is performed.

members.name: permissions
members.description: The list of permissions.

members.name: resx
members.description: Optionally allows localizing the component strings.

members.name: roleGroups
members.description: The list of role groups.

members.name: roles
members.description: The list of possible roles.

events.name: permissionsChanged
events.description: Fires when any permissions have changed, can be used for instance to have linked permissions.

events.name: userSearchQueryChanged
events.description: Fires when searching for users to add to the permissions. Emits the search query.

attributes.name: max
attributes.description: Sets the max value for the progress bar.

attributes.name: use-gradient
attributes.description: Determines if gradient colors will be used for progress bar.

attributes.name: value
attributes.description: Sets to current value for the progress bar.

cssProperties.name: --background-color
cssProperties.description: The background color of the progress bar.

cssProperties.name: --border-radius
cssProperties.description: The border radius of the progress bar.

cssProperties.name: --gradient-color-end
cssProperties.description: The gradient end color of the progress bar.

cssProperties.name: --gradient-color-start
cssProperties.description: The gradient start color of the progress bar.

cssProperties.name: --gradient-direction
cssProperties.description: The gradient direction of the progress bar.

cssProperties.name: --height
cssProperties.description: The height of the progress bar.

cssProperties.name: --min-width
cssProperties.description: The minimum width of the progress bar.

cssProperties.name: --value-background-color
cssProperties.description: The value background color of the progress bar.

attributes.name: name
attributes.description: Name of the field when used in a form.

attributes.name: value
attributes.description: Sets the value of the content of the editor.

members.name: customizeOptions
members.description:
Customize the options before initializing the editor, will have all the default options merged with 'options' if passed.
This is called last after merging default options with your custom 'options' and just before initializing the editor.

members.name: options
members.description:
Optional configuration for Jodit, see https://xdsoft.net/jodit/docs/classes/config.Config.html
This will be merged with the default options and passed to the editor.
If you prefer to not have to pass a full config object,
you can use 'customizeOptions' to modify the options before initializing the editor
instead of providing all options here.

members.name: plugins
members.description:
Allows registering your own plugins.
The callback will be called with the editor instance as the only argument durig initialization.
All other behavior needs to be implemented in the plugin itself using editor.on("eventname").
See https://xdsoft.net/jodit/examples/plugin/custom_plugin.html for an example.
Creating a plugin does NOT automatically add it to the toolbar, you need to do that yourself in 'options' or 'customizeOptions',
See https://xdsoft.net/jodit/examples/toolbar/custom_button.html for an example.

events.name: valueChange
events.description: Fires when the value changed.

events.name: valueInput
events.description: Fires during value input.

attributes.name: debounce-time
attributes.description: How many milliseconds to wait before firing the queryChanged event.

attributes.name: placeholder
attributes.description: Sets the field placeholder text.

attributes.name: query
attributes.description: Sets the query

events.name: queryChanged
events.description:
Fires up each time the search query changes.
The data passed is the new query.

attributes.description: The label for this input.

attributes.name: name
attributes.description: The name for this input, if used in forms.

attributes.name: required
attributes.description: Defines whether the field requires having a value.

attributes.name: value
attributes.description: The value of the input.

members.name: checkValidity
members.description: Reports the input validity details. See https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/API/ValidityState

events.name: valueChange
events.description: Fires when the value has changed and the user exits the input.

cssProperties.name: --background-color
cssProperties.description: Defines the background color.

cssProperties.name: --control-radius
cssProperties.description: Defines the radius for the control corners.

cssProperties.name: --danger-color
cssProperties.description: Defines the danger color used for invalid data.

cssProperties.name: --focus-color
cssProperties.description: Defines the color when the component is focused.

cssProperties.name: --foreground-color
cssProperties.description: Defines the foreground color.

cssProperties.name: --input-text-align
cssProperties.description: Allows customizing the text alignment of the input text.

attributes.name: sort-direction
attributes.description: Defines the current sort direction

events.name: sortChanged
events.description: Emitted when the sort is changed.

cssProperties.name: --color

cssProperties.name: --color-hover

cssProperties.name: --color-sorted

declarations.name: dnn-tab.tsx

members.name: show
members.description: Shows the tab.

declarations.name: dnn-vertical-overflow-menu.tsx
declarations.description: A component that shows a vertical list of items as they fit. When they don't all fit, it puts the ones that don't fit into a dropdown menu.

slots.description: The items to show in the menu.

cssProperties.name: --background-color
cssProperties.description: Defines the menu background color.

cssProperties.name: --foreground-color
cssProperties.description: A color that contrasts with the background color.

declarations.name: dnn-vertical-splitview.tsx
declarations.description:
This allows splitting a UI into vertical adjustable panels, the splitter itself is not part of this component.
- The content for the left part should be injected in the `left` slot.
- The content for the right part should be injected in the `right` slot.
- The content for the actual splitter should go in the default slot and other UI elements can be injected as long as you handle their behaviour, by default only the drag behavior is implemented in the component.

attributes.name: split-width-percentage
attributes.description: The percentage position of the splitter in the container.

attributes.name: splitter-width
attributes.description: The width of the splitter area.

members.name: getSplitWidthPercentage
members.description: Gets the current divider position percentage.

members.name: setSplitWidthPercentage
members.description: Sets the width percentage of the divider

events.name: widthChanged
events.description: Fires when the width of the divider changes.

slots.name: default
slots.description: The split divider control you want to use.

slots.name: left
slots.description: The content of the left pane.

slots.name: right
slots.description: The content of the right pane.

cssProperties.name: --left-pane-background-color
cssProperties.description: Allows customizing the left pane background-color

cssProperties.name: --right-pane-background-color
cssProperties.description: Allows customizing the right pane background-color
